pr_title: [DO NOT SQUASH] Cherry picks to 2.1 branch from master

timeline.message:
Find the name of the search path environment variable before manipulating it (#7277)

On Windows, environment variables are not case sensitive. So the variable may be named "PATH" or "Path", and in the latter case adding PATH on top of Path would discard the whole existing path.
Throw if blocking on JS result would deadlock (#7218)
Set direction along with the Locale for the UI (#7294)

Elide (p)npm stdout unless command fails (#7306)

To avoid bloating the log, only standard error output of pnpm install
(npm install if the user has elected to choose it) is echoed to the
console. If the command fails (non-zero exit code), print the standard
output contents in the log at ERROR level.
# Conflicts:
#	flow-server/src/main/java/com/vaadin/flow/server/frontend/TaskRunNpmInstall.java
#	flow-server/src/test/java/com/vaadin/flow/server/frontend/TaskRunNpmInstallTest.java
#	flow-tests/test-npm-only-features/test-npm-performance-regression/src/test/java/com/vaadin/flow/testnpmonlyfeatures/performanceregression/StartupPerformanceIT.java

Deprecate isSafariOrIOS (#7322)

It does not work reliably and should be removed in 3.0 like other isIOS method in BrowserDetails.

Always consume the stdout stream from (p)npm and log at debug level
(#7325)


# Conflicts:
#	flow-server/src/main/java/com/vaadin/flow/server/frontend/TaskRunNpmInstall.java

Update comment parser handling (#7320)

Now apparent comments inside
strings are left untouched.

Fixes #7082
Add missing method to mock UI
Avoid running dev mode server for GWT tests
Added babel plugin to transpile object literal spread { ... } syntax not supported by Edge (#7367)

timeline.bodyText: Do not forget to remove this deprecated code someday.
